title: Give Them Back!
description: Jaden wants to win the Easter egg hunt so much that he is willing to cheat. This book addresses issues of cheating and fairness while showing how conflict can be resolved in a peaceful way. This fictional life lesson can also connect to the Easter holiday, teach students about an author's purpose, and help them practice proper nouns.
meta: Easter, hunt, plan, sneaky, sorry, takes
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand text
Author's Purpose : Describe the author's purpose
Long Vowels : Discriminate medial long vowels
Proper Nouns : Understand and use names of people as proper nouns
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word from

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
